trans-unit.source: Enables the user to select a single option from a group of choices when paired with other RadioButton controls.
trans-unit.target: Consente all'utente di selezionare una singola opzione in un gruppo di scelte quando abbinato ad altri controlli RadioButton.

trans-unit.source: The RadioButton control can display text, an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, or both.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo RadioButton possibile visualizzare il testo, un <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, o entrambi.</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: When the user selects one option button (also known as a radio button) within a group, the others clear automatically.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'utente seleziona un pulsante di opzione (nota anche come un pulsante di opzione) all'interno di un gruppo, gli altri vengono automaticamente deselezionati.

trans-unit.source: All RadioButton controls in a given container, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, constitute a group.
trans-unit.target: RadioButton tutti i controlli in un determinato contenitore, ad esempio un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, costituiscono un gruppo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: To create multiple groups on one form, place each group in its own container, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: Per creare più gruppi in un form, posizionare ogni gruppo nel relativo contenitore, ad esempio un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: RadioButton and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> controls have a similar function: they offer choices a user can select or clear.
trans-unit.target: RadioButton e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>controlli dispongono di una funzione simile: offrono alternative di un utente può selezionare o deselezionare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: The difference is that multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> controls can be selected at the same time, but option buttons are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: La differenza è che più <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>possibile selezionare controlli allo stesso tempo, ma i pulsanti di opzione si escludono a vicenda.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> property to get or set the state of a RadioButton.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>proprietà da ottenere o impostare lo stato del RadioButton.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: The option button's appearance can be altered to appear as a toggle-style button or as a standard option button by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Aspetto del pulsante di opzione può essere modificato da visualizzare come pulsante interruttore o un pulsante di opzione standard impostando la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The default view of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> has its text aligned to the right of the button and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: La visualizzazione predefinita del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>è il testo allineato a destra del pulsante e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A>è impostata su `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value determining the appearance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che determina l'aspetto del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the Appearance value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control is drawn with a circular check box.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore di aspetto è impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>, quindi il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>controllo viene creato con una casella di controllo circolare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>

trans-unit.source: If the value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> is drawn as a control that can be toggled to an up or down state.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore è impostato su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>, quindi il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>viene disegnato come un controllo che può essere attivato o disattivato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>

trans-unit.source: Either type can display text, an image, or both.
trans-unit.target: Entrambi i tipi di visualizzare un testo, un'immagine o entrambi.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Il valore assegnato non è uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance*>valore proprietà viene modificato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*> value and the appearance of the control automatically change when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*>valore e l'aspetto del controllo modifica automaticamente quando si fa clic sul controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> value is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> portion of the control must be checked in code in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>è impostato su `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>parte del controllo deve essere selezionata nel codice il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>gestore dell'evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control group, this property ensures that only one of the controls is checked at a given time.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>fa parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>gruppo di controllo, questa proprietà garantisce che solo uno dei controlli sia selezionato in un determinato momento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: If the AutoCheck property is set to `false`, a group of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls will not act as a mutually exclusive group and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> property must be updated in code.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà AutoCheck è impostata su `false`, un gruppo di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>controlli non si comporterà come un gruppo si escludono a vicenda e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>proprietà deve essere aggiornata nel codice.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*> value and the appearance of the control automatically change on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*>valore e l'aspetto del controllo vengono modificati automaticamente nel <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"> </xref> evento; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the check box portion of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la posizione della casella di controllo del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the valid <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei validi <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Il valore assegnato non è uno del <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is checked.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il controllo è selezionato.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the check box is checked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la casella di controllo è selezionata; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*>le modifiche alle proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo oggetto accessibilità per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se non si chiama in modo esplicito il metodo CreateAccessibilityInstance, verrà chiamato quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>riferimento alla proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the <xref:Accessibility> assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Da ottenere o impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>proprietà, è necessario aggiungere un riferimento di <xref:Accessibility>assembly installato con .NET Framework.</xref:Accessibility> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.RadioButtonAccessibleObject> for the control.
trans-unit.target: Un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.RadioButtonAccessibleObject>per il controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.RadioButtonAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i parametri di creazione necessari quando viene creato l'handle del controllo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> che contiene i parametri di creazione necessari quando viene creato l'handle del controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le dimensioni predefinite del controllo.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> with a <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*> of 104 and a <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> of 24.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> con un <> </> *> di 104 e <> </> *> 24.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando l'utente fa doppio clic il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> style bit is set to `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control, and the DoubleClick event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>bit di stile è impostato su `false` per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>controllo e il DoubleClick non viene generato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref> control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando l'utente fa doppio clic il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"> </xref> controllo con il mouse.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> style bit is set to `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control, and the MouseDoubleClick event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>bit di stile è impostato su `false` per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>controllo e il MouseDoubleClick non viene generato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckedChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckedChanged"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Viene generato un evento richiama il gestore dell'evento tramite un delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnCheckedChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnCheckedChanged consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Questa è la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> property is set to `true` when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A>è impostata su `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>è impostata su `true` quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>si fa clic sul controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: If the user enters the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control by using the arrow keys, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> will raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Se l'utente immette il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>controllo utilizzando i tasti di direzione, la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>genererà il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated*> method.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated*>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Viene generato un evento richiama il gestore dell'evento tramite un delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnMouseUp method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnMouseUp consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Questa è la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Generates a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event for the control, simulating a click by a user.
trans-unit.target: Genera un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"> </xref> evento per il controllo, simulando un clic dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic*> method.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic*>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic*>

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: Carattere da elaborare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was successfully processed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il carattere è stato elaborato correttamente; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to this control using the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se l'utente può assegnare lo stato attivo al controllo con il tasto TAB.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can give focus to this control using the TAB key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'utente può assegnare lo stato attivo al controllo con il tasto TAB; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the text on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'allineamento del testo sul <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Il valore assegnato non è uno del <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.ToString*> method.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.ToString*>metodo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.ToString*>

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref> that indicates whether it is checked.
trans-unit.target: Rappresentazione di stringa del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"> </xref> che indica se è selezionato.
